A custom promotional bag is a highly visible and practical item that gets your brand noticed all over town. Perfect for trade show giveaways, retail stores, and corporate events.

Custom Bag Features

Key Features:

  • Large Imprint Area for High Visibility
  • Practical and Reusable Giveaway
  • Wide Variety of Styles and Materials
  • Durable Construction for Everyday Use

Popular Uses:

  • Trade Show & Event Giveaways
  • Retail & Shopping Bags
  • Employee & Client Gifts
  • School & Team Spirit Items

Why Use Promotional Bags?

Custom bags offer a large canvas for your brand, and their utility ensures they get used again and again. Every time your custom bag is carried, it acts as a mobile advertisement, increasing your brand exposure far beyond a single event.

From eco-friendly cotton totes to durable backpacks, we have an option to suit every need and budget. Our team can help you select the perfect bag and ensure your logo looks great.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the most popular type of promotional bag?

Tote bags are consistently the most popular choice due to their versatility, large imprint area, and wide range of price points, from budget-friendly non-woven polypropylene to heavy canvas.

What are the decoration options?

The most common decoration method is screen printing. For some bag styles, like backpacks or briefcases, embroidery is also a popular option for a premium look.

What is the minimum order quantity?

Minimums vary by bag, but they typically start between 50 and 150 pieces.

Popular Bag Styles

Tote Bags

The classic choice. Available in dozens of materials like cotton, canvas, jute, and non-woven polypropylene. Perfect for almost any occasion.

Drawstring Bags

A lightweight and sporty option, ideal for schools, gyms, and outdoor events. Easy to carry and offers a large print area.

Backpacks

A high-value promotional item that will be used for years. Great for employee onboarding, corporate gifts, and student events.
